channel.title: [delta]If person A PM's person B, Person B's client freezes[help]
channel.description:
so as said above
if an owner (rights 3) pm's me my client freezes and gets error:
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method18(client.java:516) at client.method102(client.java:9260) at client.method9(client.java:10517) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:136) at client.run(client.java:5388) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)[/code]
if a normal player PM's me this is not happening
also a part of the PM text is overridden so if i pm someone on their screen comes:
whattehp say's: hey whattehp say's: hey
just imagine the second line comes above the first one so u get a mishmash
can anyone help?
u will get in ma siggy :D

item.title: [delta]If person A PM's person B, Person B's client freezes[help]
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

so as said above

if an owner (rights 3) pm’s me my client freezes and gets error:

Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method18(client.java:516) at client.method102(client.java:9260) at client.method9(client.java:10517) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:136) at client.run(client.java:5388) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)

if a normal player PM’s me this is not happening

also a part of the PM text is overridden
so if i pm someone on their screen comes:

whattehp say’s: hey
whattehp say’s: hey

just imagine the second line comes above the first one so u get a mishmash

can anyone help?

u will get in ma siggy

Read full topic
item.source: [delta]If person A PM's person B, Person B's client freezes[help]
